1st,2nd,  and  3rd  Accused  guilty  to  the  charge  and  convicted  them  on
30.09.2020 and sentenced them on 23.09.2022.

ordered to pay a sum of Rs.50/- for each day until the full amount was
paid by the Petitioner.
